shortDescription: Daily hydration tracking for optimal physical and cognitive performance

researchCitations.finding: Proper hydration improves cognitive performance by up to 14% in tasks requiring attention

researchCitations.study: Armstrong et al. (2012) - Journal of Nutrition
researchCitations.finding: Mild dehydration (1.5% fluid loss) significantly impairs mood and cognitive function
Drinking 500ml water before meals increases weight loss by 44% over 12 weeks

commonBarriers: Forgetting to drink throughout the day
No tracking system or visual reminders
Not carrying a water bottle consistently
progressionPlan: Week 1: Establish baseline (track current intake). Week 2: Add 2 glasses (16oz) to baseline. Week 3-4: Reach 8 glasses/day (64oz). Week 5-8: Adjust based on activity level, maintain consistency, frontload intake (most water before 6pm).
nooLifeFeatureHighlight: Simple tap-to-log water tracking. Visual progress bars showing daily intake. GTA-style hydration task cards. Contributes to Strength and Discipline ratings. Streak tracking for consistency.
testimonial: "Never thought I'd be the person who drinks enough water. NooLife's tracking made it so easy. 40+ day streak, feel so much more energized." - Maya P.
ctaAngle: Track your hydration with visual progress tracking. Build the water intake habit. Free 3-day trial.
